subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski, surging ahead on the final lap when Dale Earnhardt Jr. ran out of fuel, won the Nascar race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway on Sunday and completed the first weekend sweep of his career.
snippet: Brad Keselowski, surging ahead on the final lap when Dale Earnhardt Jr. ran out of fuel, won the Nascar race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway on Sunday and completed the first weekend sweep of his career.
